entry.title: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH, North Perth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:19 a.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers overnight with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southeast 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers at times heavy or thunderstorms. High 17.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy or thunderstorms. Local amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High 17. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: A few showers ending after midnight then cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm in the evening. Local amount 5 mm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
